alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:31AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Custer and northeastern Fall River Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1231 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Wind Cave National Park, or 7 miles north of Hot Springs, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo Gap around 1245 AM MDT. Oral around 1250 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
